website_summaries.verdict: Great looking toaster with 4 extra-wide slots delivers high performance.
pros: Four-slot toaster has two separate controls for each pair of slots
Cord storage located underneath the toaster's base
Includes a setting for bagels and a button to cancel the heat
Uses a high lift lever to easily remove whatever is being toasted
cons: Lowest setting seems to blacken the toast more than other units

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: We typically love KitchenAid products so this toaster comes as an exception. Beyond being absolutely huge, the toasting quality is average at best. Only two of the toast duration settings are useful for bread, with the three highest settings burning the bread. Also, even though it is large, it still can't toast a large waffle evenly. Finally, the left most and right most toast slots are underpowered compared to the inner sections. Considering the price, I would absolutely not buy this again. This is no better than a $15 toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product and immediately returned it. Exterior of toaster was hot enough to burn. The lift higher function did not lift a piece of rye toast high enough out of the slot not to burn your fingers! Even on the # 2 shade, it took much to long to toast. The # 2 came out much too well done and the # 3 actually reduced burned toast. Don't know if I was unlucky enough to have received a "dud" or they are all like this. Returning it for a different brand and hope it will better. This was replacing a Breville, which after 10 years stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA STEINBERG

customer_reviews.title: This toaster looks great, but I have one complaint that made me ...
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks great, but I have one complaint that made me rate it down two stars. The toaster we got cooks very hot and we found that even on setting 1.5 to 2 would cause our toast to blacken. We have it set on one and it makes pretty good toast. So if you want to lightly toast something, you may have to watch it and manually cancel the toasting process. Overall we made it work, but its not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Berberette

customer_reviews.title: Cling cling cling:  I have a toast to make!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant initially because of a couple of the neg reviews, so far so good. Every toaster I have owned in my life has it's quirks, you just deal with it and find your "Toast Spot". My husband has his side and I have mine. We tend to eat earthy and homemade bread from my oven and it really does the product justice.
customer_reviews.author: Island Bound

customer_reviews.title: Burns toast
customer_reviews.text: Lowest setting, 1, is well done. Setting 2 blackens the toast. 3 causes smoke. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: The Man

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster! It looks great and worked great until a month before I’d had it for a year. However, Kitchenaid’s service department has been GREAT! After a quick phone call they are sending me a brand new one and paying for the return of the old one. So no harm no foul. Will definitely keep buying Kitchenaid as they have always had great service and great products.
customer_reviews.author: Anne C. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE BURNT FINGERS
customer_reviews.text: awesome toaster, perfect toast every time, the best part it actually lifts the toast out of the toaster for you, no more burnt fingers, what a concept!
customer_reviews.author: RB-St Louis

customer_reviews.title: Got it today..........returning it today !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this toaster today. Figured I would give it a quick try. Set the "shade" to 2. Set off all my smoke detectors.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Now have 2 of these, one at home and one at the cottage. Makes great toast as far as my wife and I are concerned. The toast may not be exactly the same shade over the entire slice of bread and both sides may not exactly match due to differences in heat from inside to outside, but it is only toast after all and not a work of art. It does beep when the toast pops up but it is not that loud and you know the toast is done If you are not standing next to it waiting. Also, it makes toast much quicker that the one we had at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Braun

customer_reviews.title: SEEMS TERRIFIC; PLENTY OF USE IN OUR HOVEL
customer_reviews.text: As you might expect, and like other kitchen machines, jobbies, and appliances, I've never used the thing. So how would I rate it, you might ask? Here's how: I bought it for Momma 'cause it looked pretty and had plenty of big holes and things to grab onto so you could burn toast and some fine bagels. While plenty big on the counter, it does what it's advertised to do. And now I get a nice, fat, cheesy egg and bacon bagel on Saturday morning. Tasty AND toasty like. At a nice price, too. So, there.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but needs to be supervised during toasting.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made machine. I like the bagel button and the ease to clean the crumbs. What really bothers me are the toasting levels. Every time I use this I have to be really careful not to burn the toast or bun. Often number 2 is too much and burns and often number 1 is not strong enough to do the job so I end up doing number 1 again and canceling at half point of that 'run'. I feel I have to be near the mahine when toasting so I don't burn my food. I really don't know what the levels 3 and up could be for?
customer_reviews.author: Marian Kopecky

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works well
customer_reviews.text: So far so good it's been working great. I have it on the lowest setting and the toast come out the right shade for me, however it does come out more toasted on one side than the other. I love the sleek look but it's a bit bulky on my countertop. Each compartment has a small stainless steel tray in the back that can be removed to empty the crumbs but a slight shake is needed to dislodge the pieces of bread that get stuck on the inside and even some don’t come off.
customer_reviews.author: BUZ_TUED

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, cooks good.
customer_reviews.text: A couple inches bigger all around than my old cuisinart, but still fits the space. Love the pictures telling me how to place the bagels! And it is faster and hotter than a rocket booster engine.... start your toast at a lower number than you think you'll need. Even eggos from the deep freeze get browned really fast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this from Amazon but have returned it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this from Amazon but have returned it twice to KitchenAid due to its lack of performance. It has 5 settings for toasting. Number 1 is OK but number 2 through 5 burns. Number 3 is charred. I stopped number 4 before time ran out because it was smoking so badly. I am scared to try it on 5. It says the setting are for the amount of "shade" . They should change that to the amount of CHAR. Its just an awful piece of equipment. We have experienced this same result of 2 different units. Even the customer service girl said she had a problem with hers. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Barry G.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend making this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really like this toaster. We've owned a series of toasters that were ok but not great. These were name brands, and disappointing. This Kitchenaid toaster is well built, cleans easy, and makes toast just perfect for us. It also has a heavy duty electric cord that is substantial, a big plus. The clean out is very quick and effortless. The access slots are a good width and allow for thicker slices of bread. We make our own bread here at home and like a bit thicker slice. I highly recommend making this purchase. I'm thinking this is the best toaster we've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Cantelmo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It "works" but it doesn't toast bread evenly or consistently. I'll put 4 slices in from the same loaf, at the same time and setting, and all four can come out at varying levels of toasted - sometimes one side is far more toasted than the other, sometimes only the top half is toasted, sometimes one slice is toasted well while the 2nd is hardly done. Very annoying considering the price tag. Will definitely not be buying KitchenAid again, total rip-off - $$ goes toward the brand name instead of good quality product. Another annoying thing is how large it is, pay attention to the dimensions!! It takes up a considerable amount of room in my counter.
customer_reviews.author: lmd91

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid, what more can be said?
customer_reviews.text: My choices were between this and a Cuisinart, and bvetween the two, honestly I went with this because it better matched our kitchen theme than the Cuisinart. Toasts evenly, my girl likes bagels, one side darker than the other, and the bagel setting does this perfectly too. Toasts everything we throw in there like a champ, and the 5 timer settings are pretty evenly, well, timed... 1 is a very very very light toasting from frozen, 5 is pure carbon charcoal... I've always stuck with Kitchen Aid and Cuisinart, they really do put in the test of time, and the quality speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Item looked used.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these toasters in March of this(2017). When the package was opened the toaster looked used. It was all smudged up, had water marks and didn’t came in a plastic as they all usually do. Very disappointed Amazon. Only 1 star from me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is nice. A little expensive
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is nice. A little expensive, but still nice. It definitely get the job done. I toast bread somewhere between 1 and 2, anything above that is burnt. If you were to toast something max, it might just disintegrate. Has 4 slots total, a simple dial for each 2 that looks old fashioned but in a modern way. Two easily cleanable crumb trays. It's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Cole L.

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toaster ever. Previously owned the KitchenAid toaster with buttons instead of levers and it was the best. Lasted 8 years with no issues. So bought this one hoping for the same quality as they don’t seem to make the other. This toaster doesn’t toast. I have never used a setting above 3 but everything is either slightly warmed or black and beyond eating. Pop tarts fall into the side and you have to preform surgery in order to get them out. If I hadn’t missed the return window because of all the Coronavirus stuff going on it would be headed back. So unhappy!!! What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mollise

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a keeper
customer_reviews.text: After getting two defective toasters (different brands), this is the third one we bought and finally are keeping. The first one had a handle that snapped off on the second day of use and the second one would only warm the bread but wouldn't brown it. This one works as a toaster should. It is a little bulky and takes up more space on the counter than the other two, and thus I took off one star because of that. I only wish it had a nicer, more sleek/modern design.
customer_reviews.author: joanieD

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this toaster at all. It toasts very uneven. Also, the slots are very short and most bread has to be cut in half to fit. Went out and bought a different toaster.
customer_reviews.author: tucsonlady

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the model upgrade to my original KitchenAid toaster and this seemed to be the next model choice. What I like? - toasts evenly, light weight, easy to use. What I miss? - Feels cheaply made compared to my last model, the toaster paddles are flimsy and I'm afraid they will not hold up under heavy use. I also find the style not to be as stylish as my previous one. All in all, it does the job and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Campsandalwood

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent toaster that works as a toaster should.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th toaster I have bought over the last year, this is the only one that toasts bread evenly on both sides in all four slots. All of the others are in the junk pile, they are not even worth donating to charity or giving away, some were expensive. The only thing I believe Kitchen Aid could have done to improve this toaster is to make the slots longer for toasting large slices of Rye bread or other longer slices. Other than that this is an excellent toaster and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It has one job and it does it very poorly
customer_reviews.text: Update: 10 months after purchase it completely stopped working. We usually love kitchenaid appliances but as some other reviewers have stated this model is very subpar. The levers are sticky and sometimes take 3-4 attempts before they will “catch” and begin toasting. Any setting above a 1 burns the toast and it toasts unevenly even on 1. For the price and brand name the quality is highly disappointing. (Our previous $20 toaster did a far superior job and lasted years!)
customer_reviews.author: baron family

customer_reviews.title: Great four slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: Great four slice toaster, but I wish the length was a bit longer for larger sliced bread. We have to pop the toast up and turn over.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKay713

customer_reviews.title: Durable, custom settings.
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model of this toaster for many years (it didn’t have the bagel option) and loved it. I had to replace it due to my teenage sons buttering their bread before putting in the toaster, and subsequently washing the toaster in the sink. It survived another 5 years and finally gave up. Glad to have a shiny new house new toaster. Both boys are now grown and have their own toasters now, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin D Stewart

customer_reviews.title: As others have said setting 3 is all you need
customer_reviews.text: Other toasters you have to drop twice even on darkest setting for nice crisp nook and cranny muffins. Not with this toaster, one drop on setting 4 is perfect, setting 5 you better be paying attention. For regular bread setting 2 or 3 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed at or before one-year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 11/2016 to replace an earlier model KA red 4-slice toaster that lasted several years. This one started failing within the first year and the elements didn't turn red anymore. I noticed it was taking longer and longer to toast bread and english muffins. I didn't notice how unevenly it toasted until we bought a toaster oven last week. I would have sent back it for warranty but I thought I had purchased it a year earlier than I actually did.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Actually toasts!  And does it well!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toaster for about a year and a half now. I'm not sure any other toaster I've owned lasted this long with me before. It consistently toasts bread perfectly every time, which is more than I can say for any other toaster I've owned. Also, looks nice enough that the wife doesn't mind it sitting on the counter. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nilsen

customer_reviews.title: A lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few weeks and today it just doesn’t work. Doesn’t toast even after putting it down 3 times. Very disappointed in this toaster. I’ve always bought kitchen aid. Thinking it’s a lemon. Trying to have amazon help me but haven’t gotten a call back as yet. Will see how much the help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design but poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster, it looks sleek and well it toasts bread. The only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is because the label that was on the cord left major sticky tack on it and I had to order Goop Gone or whatever that stuff is called to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: Vcartwright13

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it plays an electronic beep just before popping up the toast, so you don't flinch like with every other toaster. Never had a toaster that did that. It also looks nice in red, and the toast slot openings are extra big. I knocked one star off simply because the two levers sit unevenly together, even right out of the box. In fact I just noticed that even in the product description photos on amazon they look uneven too... Why???
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased / broken but replaced
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful unit. No complaints. It makes great toast. What else is there to say, it works great. Update; the unit malfunction. Called amazon, they called KitchenAid. A new unit was immediately sent. Old unit prepaid back to KitchenAid. Outstanding service. Love the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works well, I have to keep it on setting 2 because anything after that the toast starts to turn black. The bagel option although works, leaves the bagel more Hard then toasted. The toaster before the toast POPs up it makes a BEEP sound that kind of sounds like a fire alarm beep, That is the only real issue I have with it. The beep is unnecessary since when the toast pops up, its loud and there's no way you can miss the sound (with out the beep). The beep is a bit excessive.
customer_reviews.author: SIR Decker

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aide 4-slice Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this toaster because it has a heavier base so when I press down the handles on the toaster. I’ve tried other 4-slice toasters and they tip over when I press the levers down - Spend the extra money because you’ll have this kitchen aide toaster for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Good and bad. Its pretty. Sometimes it toasts bagels PERFECT. And it even toasts frozen bagels. But sometimes it toasts uneven, sometimes the inside of the bagels is toasted nice, and then the outside is not toasted at all. Don't understand that at all. I would not recommend this toaster, but we will keep it as it is the best one we have found so far based not frozen bagel toasting.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer5

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT AND LOOKS LOVELY
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT AND LOOKS LOVELY! We had an old toaster that still worked but it looked dated and old. This new KitchenAid toaster is beautiful and it works great. It also makes the entire kitchen look updated!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing toaster! Very impressed! Leaves bread, waffles, English muffins beautifully and perfectly toasted! Beautiful too! So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MrsPAC

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: Variable toasting. One side more done than the other sometimes. Often top of toast not toasted and bottom done well. Has 5 settings but have to micro adjust between 2 and 3. Have to mash down the lever to start toasting. Love all my other KA products, but not this one. Color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco

customer_reviews.title: Amazon only gives 30 day return window. On appliances its not long enough. Beware before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that 2 days after the return window the right side of the toaster wouldnt stay down. Amazon cant take it back and wont help me. Albert said he would contact kitchenaide about it but then i got an email telling me i had to contact them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Salamon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to the snobbist toaster;0)
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate toaster. Toasts according to the setting. Very easy to clean, There are 2 drawers on the back side of toaster that come out for cleaning. Also, used the bagel setting for the first time and works great also. Crispy on the outside and soft on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: darlene herrera

customer_reviews.title: A very pretty piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: A very pretty piece of junk. Purchased the KitchenAid toaster because I have a few of their other products and have been happy with them. Here are the problems: the left side of the toaster does not stay down and will not toast the bread. Only 2 of 4 will toast at one time. The bigger problem is that the settings go from 1-5 on dial for toasting preference but ALWAYS BURNS ON THE 1 SETTING. So only half the toaster works and the other side has to be monitored so the toast doesn’t burn. Number 5 setting sets of the smoke detectors. Don’t waste your money on this KitchenAid product!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sage

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the product review as of yet because it is a Christmas gift, but I am amazed that this toaster was shipped in its original box with the picture of the toaster is showing... This box was not disguise in the least. If you live in the area thievery Best bet is to have them shipped to a PO Box as the box is not disguised
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: OP Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking toaster, a little overpowered. Anything past 1 burns toast. For the price, I would have expected a few more features. It seems well made and durable, typical for a KitchenAid product.
customer_reviews.author: AJF

customer_reviews.title: won't stay down
customer_reviews.text: THis is the second kitcheaid toaster. THe first would not work at all, levers would not stay down. This second only worked when it felt like it. Too expensive and I'm sending it back. Going cheap next time.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster, but doesn't toast bread evenly
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great toaster. The only downside is that it toasts a bit unevenly (one side of the bread will get darker than the other). Otherwise it is good. It has lasted longer than all of our other toasters. It even beeps before it pops up.
customer_reviews.author: AdellAdam

customer_reviews.title: Best toaster I have had
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 4-slice toaster and it feels durable, has catching trays for the crumbs, mulitple toasting settings, and "dings" when the toast is ready. The only negative is that finding a toaster cover to fit it has been a bit of a challenge due to the size.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Slow and uneven
customer_reviews.text: Slowest toaster I’ve ever owned. My prior Cuisinart toaster worked well for many years. Bought this to replace it. First slices take More than twice as long as the old toaster. Toasting is uneven. Second set of slices are faster but get burnt if you don’t turn down the setting a couple clicks and keep an eye on them. Because of how long it takes, toast tends to be too dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kupcinskas

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: He handle wouldn’t stay down and would keep popping up after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Bowker

customer_reviews.title: New KitchenAid KMT41150B toaster
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity; two buttons and a lever on each side. It toasts evenly; four slices set the same cook the same! Delivered as promised when promised. I can't comment on durability as I've only had it a week, but KitchenAid is a name I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Dog

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TOAST !
customer_reviews.text: The finish and quality on this toaster was even better than we expected from KitchenAid which is a brand we trust. It also has a buzzer to signal when your toast is ready. We are quite happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FIGJAM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer's Remorse
customer_reviews.text: Had this toaster less than 2 months. When toasting 4 slices at the same time the left pair does not pop up any longer causing them to burn if you do not manually push "cancel". Also just started toasting much lighter on the same setting as before. Just missed Amazon's return window. Stuck with a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: joejoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. Looks great. Only gripe is it sounds an alarm when your food is done. I have no trouble hearing the toaster spit my food out. I don't need it to yell at me too. So far I have found no way to stop the annoying beeeeep.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Toaster and elements Take FOREVER to heat up!!! Sent back for another one. Same problem. Slowest toaster I have ever experienced. Toast takes longer than cooking an egg!!!! VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: This things makes the perfect toast! It’s evenly toasted every time and the ding when done is a nice extra touch. It also looks great and matches my other kitchenaid small appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nye

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before I bought this (for myself for Christmas!), and I'm so far very happy with it. It toasts evenly and fairly quickly (I've learned that good toasters are methodical toasters). It's easy to get the toast in and out, including bagels. The dial settings seem accurate. It's a beautiful looking toaster and not overly huge for a four slicer. Who could ask for anything more (from a toaster!)?
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Good toaster. It actually has "high" settings that really ...
customer_reviews.text: Good toaster. It actually has "high" settings that really are high Only disappointment was that the "high lift" isn't very high
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great, nice-looking toaster
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 2-slice cheapie toaster with this one - works great, well-made, easy to clean and toasts just right. It looks nice enough to keep it stored on the counter-top too.
customer_reviews.author: MCNOCO22

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and the color
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has problems with the temperature setting. I got one for Christmas. Had problems with it burning on the lowest setting. I requested to return it and ordered another one of the exact item. I like the design and the color. The second toaster also had problems with burning the bread. I am returning the second toaster. Plan to purchase a totally different toaster this time.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It’s a toaster, it works, does what it says, what else is there to ask of it? No Jesus toast yet, still waiting for that miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Insuffivient product but good vendor experience
customer_reviews.text: On the upside the buying and return process was excellent. Downside is the toaster was bad enough to return it. Takes forever to toast and even on the darkest setting it barely toasts anything.
customer_reviews.author: charles dennison

customer_reviews.title: True red toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster and its settings....very light to very dark! So easy to keep clean withremovable crumb trays! The red is a true red and I love hiw the color just pops in my newly remodeled kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: M. Arkebauer

customer_reviews.title: heavy
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is quite large and heavy. It reminded me of the toasters used in hotels for complimentery breakfast. Seems to take a long time to toast.
customer_reviews.author: romthom

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves making sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Wife says she loves it because she can now make me 2 sandwiches at the same time. Hahahaha She it's a funny one!
customer_reviews.author: Big L

customer_reviews.title: Super hot
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looked good and is easy to clean. My biggest issue was the temperature. I put a slice of bread in on 3 and it came out very dark, almost burnt. I can't imagine what a 4 or 5 would do!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Attractive...and toasts too!
customer_reviews.text: We put all our appliances away when we are done with them...except this one. My wife thinks it's so attractive, she leaves it on the counter top. Oh, and yeah, it does a great job of toasting too...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It burns your toast on the lowest setting!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a piece of crap. I expected more from a well known brand. You put the setting on the lowest number and your toast still comes out well done, I would hate to see what happens if I were to put it on the highest number, it would probably be burnt to a crisp. I would not recommend this toaster to anyone. I am buying another toaster from Kohl's & it is a Cuisinart and it looks just like this one from KitchenAid, but it had 100% 5 star ratings from all whom purchased it, so we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wood

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product in August 2018, we are now in October 2019, that is a bit more than a year after we bought this and we can only toast 2 slides at a time as the left toaster doesnt work anymore. And it is impossible to open despite the fact that I have bought specific screwdrivers. Clearly stay away from this model, our former Cuisinart worked for 5 years...
customer_reviews.author: JulienR

customer_reviews.title: This is not really a toaster - it's a "bread warmer".
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the look of this toaster, but even she admits that you have to put bread through it twice in order to get toast! And - to be fair to the manufacturer - the problem is really America's 110V supply. It simply doesn't generate enough "oomph" to get the job done (as with electric kettles, etc.) This machine makes nice toast - if you are prepared to be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toaster
customer_reviews.text: My toast literally tastes better. This is a super product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: My bread enjoys it's new tanning bed...
customer_reviews.text: For the first week or two as well it was toasting unevenly. One side would be barely toasted and the other dark brown. It seems to have got it's act together with time and is functioning well. It looks great and I mean for the price, not a bad toaster at all.
customer_reviews.author: MC Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas Gift for my daughters family, they Love it. I bought a inexpensive toaster when they bought their house, did not like, so I spent a little more even our 9 year old Granddaughter respects Kitchen Aid Quality.
customer_reviews.author: sandralee

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It works great. I never had a problem with any of my Kichen Aid small appliances and this one looks up to par so far.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. You only need to set it on 1 for a perfect piece of toast. A little bit pricey but good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good overall. Makes a noise when done to alert you. I find it odd, but the family likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It toasts perfect on 1 setting, any higher will burn. Silver is a little different than kitchen aid pro5 mixer.
customer_reviews.author: wolf

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I expect it to do
customer_reviews.text: It toasts my bread It warms leftover pancakes and french toast It makes a futuristic beep when it's done Has a nifty high-lift lever for those smaller pieces of bread It matches our other red KitchenAid small appliances What else can be said? :)
customer_reviews.author: l33tDad

customer_reviews.title: It’s A Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great toaster for the money. Not really much to say beyond that, it’s still just a toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Plati

customer_reviews.title: A slow disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a well-made toaster but, it takes forever to toast a slice of bread! And if you're looking for a toaster that toasts superbly even, then I suggest you keep looking. This toaster is designed to wrap the excess cord under the bottom of the toaster but, it is nearly impossible to do so; the design of the cord is thick and bulky, making it nearly impossible to hide the excess. Overall, it's nice looking and decent quality but, the cord and the slow unevenness of the toasting make it a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Wood

customer_reviews.title: A much loved gift.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was thrilled beyond belief to get this toaster! It's a great toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Beans In My Ears

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest toaster
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for my needs. I’ve had some uneven toast but most of the time it’s fine. It is easy to use and looks really nice so I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!  KitchenAid should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster to replace old 2 slot toaster. Out of the box it has been terrible! Both finger knobs that you push down on have fallen off. If you use any setting other than #1, you get a burned mess. Setting #1 doesn't even brown bread, but setting #2 chars everything. It is cheaply made and a disappointment. Not sure how it received all these good reviews. It's junk!
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and efficient. The toaster works great and matches lovely with the rest of my KitchenAid appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Still_Winter

customer_reviews.title: toasts too dark
customer_reviews.text: Even level one was too dark and dry. This toaster does not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very flexable toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid toaster, the wife and kids use this thing like crazy, they like all the settings and the width of the slots, seems to be sturdy construction, we should be using this for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: G. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy toaster, not a flimsy plastic kind. EASY to use. Easy to clean. Perfect results every time. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Recently did stainless steel appliances in my kitchen so I wanted my toaster to match. My husband and I use the toaster frequently
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. Actually makes Toast not light but Dark the way I love it. and Still allows for the Wife to have her Wimpy light toast.. It seems like over the years we end up back with KitchenAid.
customer_reviews.author: Dannjr

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love...
customer_reviews.text: I feel so fancy with this toaster. Like. If I get a divorce... this toaster goes with ME. It perfectly toasts my bread without burning it. It’s got a smooth functionality.. I’m in love with this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee Fielding

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying more than other ones.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Surprisingly it toasts much better than the one I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Knobs spin freely
customer_reviews.text: The shade control knobs spin freely so often times what's getting toasted burns and stinks up the kitchen or doesn't get toasted at all. It was purchased to go with our Kitchenaid mixer, which has been outstanding and gets a lot of use. It's the only reason we've kept the toaster. I've considered using a drop of superglue on the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Don. Riggsbee

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster. Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster. Bigger than expected... quite a bit bigger than our previous 4 slice toaster, but love the wide slots and professional look.
customer_reviews.author: MRFarm

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this toaster very user friendly and toasts to ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this toaster very user friendly and toasts to our liking relatively quickly faster than our other toaster
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: gift for my 28 year old daughter (which has great taste) .. in her words .. "perfection"
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. All toasters aren't the same. This one works perfect. Wish I could turn off the alarm when its finished toasting but it's rather quiet just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: BARB L

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient toaster
customer_reviews.text: We find this toaster to be good at toasting the bread evenly and easy to use. The toaster is easy to keep clean and overall it was an excellent buy. We would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: It's a toaster
customer_reviews.text: The parents needed a new toaster and this one got chosen. So far their assessment of it has been "it browns our bread like it's supposed to", so I guess it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: It’s a toaster works great for what my family’s needs are!
customer_reviews.author: Kentfield family

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like my kitchenaid appliances so much i bought this as an anniversary gift. They loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Glick

product_meta.title: KitchenAid Kmt4115cu 4-Slice Toaster with Manual High-Lift Lever, Contour Silver
product_meta.description: Color:Contour SilverAn attractive and functional addition to any countertop, the Kitchen Aid 4-Slice Toaster offers a variety of functions for everyday use. Toast bread to your desired shade, precisely toast the cut sides of bagels, defrost and toast frozen food or reheat previously toasted food in under a minute. Plus, a high lift lever makes it easy to remove whatever you're toasting.
feature_bullets: 4 Extra-Wide Slots. 1 1/2 inches wide to accommodate whatever you're toasting - bagels, english muffins, thick breads and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,446 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
